circuitDataFilename.description: Path to circuit data, e.g. `host.{circuit}.circuit.data`. If left empty, circuit data from mock trusted setup provided. Defaults to empty string (i.e. no circuit data.)
circuitDataFilename.title: Circuit Data Filename

trustedSetupFilename.description: Path to trusted setup parameters, e.g. `K22.params`. If left empty, mock trusted setup is provided. Defaults to empty string (i.e. no trusted setup.)
trustedSetupFilename.title: Trusted Setup Filename

verificationKeyFilename.description: Path to verification key, e.g. `host.{circuit}.circuit.data.vkey.data`. If left empty, verification key from mock trusted setup provided. Defaults to empty string (i.e. no verification key.)
verificationKeyFilename.title: Verification Key Filename
